fast_mode.name: serial.fast_mode
fast_mode.label: Enable fast mode
fast_mode.tip: Will make the command as short as possible to have a faster communication (will remove spaces and unnecessary line numbers)

type.name: device.type
type.label: Select device type
type.tip: Select the type of mechanism used by the device

angle_conversion_factor.name: device.angle_conversion_factor
angle_conversion_factor.label: Angle conversion factor
angle_conversion_factor.tip: The value that makes the arm to turn one full turn

offset_angle_1.name: device.offset_angle_1
offset_angle_1.label: Insert angular position homing offset
offset_angle_1.tip: Angle for the home position of the arm (uses the values from the conversion factor, not rad: if angle_conversion_factor is 6 and must shift the homing by half turn must put 1.5

offset_angle_2.name: device.offset_angle_2
offset_angle_2.label: Insert second arm homing position offset
offset_angle_2.tip: Angle for the home position of the second arm (uses the values from the conversion factor, not rad: if angle_conversion_factor is 6 and must shift the homing by half turn must put 1.5

connected.name: scripts.connected
connected.label: On connection
connected.tip: This script will run when the device is connected

before.name: scripts.before
before.label: Before drawing
before.tip: This script will run before starting to draw something

after.name: scripts.after
after.label: After drawing
after.tip: This script will run after the drawing is done

on_ready.name: autostart.on_ready
on_ready.label: Start drawing on power up
on_ready.tip: Enable this option to start drawing automatically from the full list of drawings every time the device is turned on

interval.name: autostart.interval
interval.label: Interval between drawings [h]
interval.tip: Write the number of seconds to let the table pause between drawings

width.name: leds.width
width.label: Leds number on the largest side
width.tip: Number of LEDs in the longest side

height.name: leds.height
height.label: Leds number on the smallest side
height.tip: Number of LEDs in the shortest side

type.name: leds.type
type.label: Select a led type
type.tip: RGB and RGBW LEDs are compatible with WS2812B compatible drivers. The 'Dimmable' option is suitable for single color strips.
